WITH bs AS ( SELECT org.PI2 AS areaId, org.PN2 AS areaName, org.PI3 AS geoId, org.PN3 AS geoName, org.PI4 AS unitId, org.PN4 AS unitName, dist.DIST_CODE AS distCode, dist.DIST_NAME AS distName,
sum(data.box) AS box, sum(data.ton) AS ton, sum(data.GROSS_SALES) AS price
FROM rpt_data_sale data inner join mdm_product prod on data.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod.PROD_CODE left join mdm_store store on data.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE
inner join dms_client client on data.CLIENT_ID=client.CLIENT_ID inner join mdm_distributor dist on client.DIST_ID=dist.DIST_ID left join base_org org on org.ORG_ID=dist.ORG_ID
WHERE 1=1 $ge_billDate$ $le_billDate$ $orgId$ $distId$ $corpId$ $typeId$ $channelId$ AND org.PI2 IS NOT NULL AND org.PI3 IS NOT NULL AND org.PI4 IS NOT NULL GROUP BY org.PI2, org.PN2, org.PI3, org.PN3, org.PI4, org.PN4, dist.DIST_CODE, dist.DIST_NAME )
--创建临时表 SELECT * INTO #TEMP_TABLE FROM bs
SELECT 'a','Total','Kraft','','','','', sum(box),sum(ton),sum(price) FROM #TEMP_TABLE
UNION all
SELECT 'Total',CAST(areaId AS VARCHAR),'Kraft',areaName,'','','', sum(box),sum(ton),sum(price)
FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY areaId,areaName
UNION all
SELECT CAST(areaId AS VARCHAR),CAST(geoId AS VARCHAR),'Kraft',areaName,geoName,'','', sum(box),sum(ton),sum(price)
FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY areaId,areaName, geoId,geoName
UNION all
SELECT CAST(geoId AS VARCHAR),CAST(unitId AS VARCHAR),'Kraft',areaName,geoName,unitName,'', sum(box),sum(ton),sum(price)
FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY areaId,areaName, geoId,geoName, unitId,unitName
UNION all
SELECT CAST(unitId AS VARCHAR),distCode,'Kraft',areaName,geoName,unitName,distName, sum(box),sum(ton),sum(price)
FROM #TEMP_TABLE GROUP BY areaId,areaName, geoId,geoName, unitId,unitName, distCode,distName
--删除临时表 IF object_id('tempdb..#TEMP_TABLE') IS NOT NULL BEGIN DROP TABLE #TEMP_TABLE END
